item.title: ACM Designing Interactive Systems 2019
item.description: San Diego, California - June 23 to 28, 2019 Contesting Borders and Intersections The ACM conference on Designing Interactive Systems (DIS) is the premier international and interdisciplinary conference encompassing all issues related to the design and deployment of interactive systems where designers, artists, theorists, psychologists, user experience researchers, systems engineers and many more come together to debate and shape the future of interaction systems research, design, and practice. The theme for ACM DIS2019 is “Contesting Borders and Intersections.
